review_text: i love this range of body lotions as they arenu2019t greasy are easy to apply and soak in quickly and leave my skin feeling super soft and moisturised great value for money and the scent is fresh and light a great go to beauty essential in my bathroom cupboard this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: vaseline intensive care aloe soothe body lotion 400ml
review_title: a miracle in a bottle absolutely love this product
review_text: i suffer with dry sensitive skin and vaseline is one of very few products that doesnt make my skin flare up and itch like crazythe first thing i noticed was the beautiful fresh smell that escaped as i lifted the cap as i applied a drop to my skin i instantly felt a soothing relief and easily moisturised into my skin absorbing effortlessly and not at all greasy unlike alot of other moisturisers ive tried i use this product every day and it has improved my dry skin condition massively couldnt recommend this product enough i absolutely love it this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: vaseline intensive care aloe soothe body lotion 400ml
review_text: so prior to receiving this i had pretty rough elbows in particular and my skin feels dry as a busy mum of two i admit i sometimes neglect myself some of you may empathise but this product trial gave me the perfect opportunity to reconnect with myself and have a bit of u201cme timeu201d so for 3 days after my baths shower i smothered myself with this i must admit the first time i put this on i wasnu2019t sure about the smell itu2019s not offensive itu2019s like a cucumber smell although itu2019s aloe but i tend to smell of perfumes all the time however by day 3 i actually liked the smell application it went on nicely not too thick and soaked in pretty quickly it didnu2019t feel sticky i always have my morning wash by 0730 but even in the evening before bedtime my skin is feeling noticibly softer and my rough elbows gone verdict thumbs up yes i will be continuing to use this thank you for a fab product trial and for introducing me to vaseline aloe this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple water boost skin quench sleeping cream 50ml
review_text: this cream is light odourless and leaves the skin feeling genuinely smooth supple and refreshed i use it as part of my nightly routine applying it when going to bed after washing and drying my face it is light enough not to clog the pores or feel sticky on the face and in the morning my face always feels smooth and replenished i have also tried using this cream during the daytime and while it has all the benefits described above itu2019s not longlasting enough in terms of the hydration it gives meaning you often feel the need to reapply after a few hours all in all a great overnight moisturiser if you have sensitive skin itu2019s unscented and itu2019s really gentle on sore patches this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: bovril extract beef and yeast 250g
review_text: we all crave things that transport us back to more innocent times for me bovril is one of those things from the gooey unctuousness of the tar black bovril overflowing from the spoon to the ding ding ding as i stir it in hot water to make it dissolve and the earthy beefy smell with hints of celery and goodness knows what else sometimes you can get alcohol fatigue so bovril is a great alternative to a nightcap or even mug of tea i even go so far as to dissolve a pat of butter in it too for extra richness and within an hour im pretty much knocked out and sleep soundly until morning warm and comforted this pack will last me a long time i am sure certainly 2 winters

review_text: this lightly fragranced lotion dispenses easily from the bottle i found it spread well across my skin and was absorbed quite quickly it really seemed to work well on my dryer areas such as knees and elbows so i tried it on my feet also this was a revelation to me as being quite thin it was absorbed very quickly which meant no need for bed socks nor me slipping all over the place all night and also it moisturised my feet really well i am really impressed with this versatile lotion this review was collected as part of a promotion

review_text: winter has left me with very dry skin especially on my hands and wrists so this was a perfect solution this moisturiser has a very clean fresh smell of aloe and absorbs really quickly into your skin there is no greasy feel and only a small amount is needed to make a difference the 400ml bottle should last me well into the spring and i will be adding it to my daily routine this review was collected as part of a promotion

review_title: a miracle in a bottle absolutely love this product
review_text: i suffer from dry sensitive skin and vaseline products are one of very few moisturizers i can use without my skin reacting by flaring up or itching terriblythe first thing i noticed was the beautiful fresh aroma as soon as i clipped open the lidas soon as i applied a drop onto my skin i instantly felt a soothing sensation and didnt feel greasy unlike many moisturizers and absorbed quickly but effectively as my skin quickly felt moisturised and hydrated this product has helped my dry skin problem massively i use it every day particularly after showering or bath and also before bed with the confidence my skin will still be feeling freshly moisturised come the morning fantastic product and definatly a recommendation from me this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple water boost skin quench sleeping cream 50ml
review_text: i do like the simple brand products as i have sensitive skin and i need to be really careful with chemicals this simple face moisturiser moisturiser is fantastic it has very little smell it has a gel like consistency without the stickiness or gloopiness of some other products that are on the market the moisturiser applies well to the skin and sinks in quickly leaving my skin feeling refreshed and moisturised with no heaviness or stickiness i had no reaction to this moisturiser at all i have a combination skin and this moisturiser was ideal as it has no greasiness after a few hours of wearing i find that my skin feels totally normal there is no greasiness at all which i sometimes get with creamy moisturisers also i found that i could apply makeup easily within a short period of time as the moisturiser sunk into my skin easily i have light wrinkles and although the moisturiser can not perform miracles it did prevent my skin from drying over the day from the effects of heating or the sun i think that this is one of the best moisturisers that i have used it does the job with no side effects

review_text: so prior to receiving this i had pretty rough elbows in particular and my skin feels dry as a busy mum of two i admit i sometimes neglect myself some of you may empathise but this product trial gave me the perfect opportunity to reconnect with myself and have a bit of u201cme timeu201d so for 3 days after my baths shower i smothered myself with this i must admit the first time i put this on i wasnt sure about the smell its not offensive its like a cucumber smell although its aloe but i tend to smell of perfumes all the time however by day 3 i actually liked the smell application it went on nicely not too thick and soaked in pretty quickly it didnt feel sticky i always have my morning wash by 0730 but even in the evening before bedtime my skin is feeling noticibly softer and my rough elbows gone verdict thumbs up yes i will be continuing to use this thank you for a fab product trial and for introducing me to vaseline aloe this review was collected as part of a promotion

review_title: have been using for years works well on all my silk wool and linen items
review_text: i have been using this for years and it works really well it has not damaged any of my clothes it has not left a residue on any of my clothes it keeps my clothes in good condition and colour it has not irritated my sensitive skin in any way i have been using persil silk and wool for years and it is really good i only looked on amazon as my supermarket had not had any for 3 weeks in a row and realised it costs about the same here on amazon pantry i wash my silk wool and linen items on a silk wash on my washing machine that is a setting but i think it comes to the following30 degrees c light action very low spin cycle very important not to hard spin wool or silk ruins the fibres i hang them up to dry all of these items are either hand wash only or dry clean only items and quite honestly i do not have the strength to hand wash or the wish to dry clean this has worked well for me for 10 years using this detergent

review_text: great product i used this for the first time after a bath and shaving my legs the lotion wasnt greasy and left my legs smelling and feeling fab i cant wait to take this on holiday with me and hydrate my skin after a day in the sun this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: vaseline intensive care aloe soothe body lotion 400ml
review_title: light non greasy and super moisturising
review_text: winter is really taking its toll on my skin and this moisturiser has been wonderful it soaks in fast isnt greasy at all and has a really refreshing aloe scent as well it does everything i need to and does it well its water based so probably not best for oily skin but on my normal to dry its doing great im pretty sensitive too but this hasnt caused any problems however it also contains palm oil now palm oil is a brilliant ingredient and does a lot of wonderful things but at the moment its rarely ethically sourced and thats my only issue with this product unilever are a big big player and need to address this issue this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: vaseline intensive care aloe soothe body lotion 400ml
review_text: i have tried this product and was totally impressed with how soft it left my skin its refreshing to the touch as well as to smell i suffer from dry skin and this has made such a difference i will be using this product all the time from now on this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple water boost hydrating cleansing face wipes 25 wipes
review_text: i tried the simple hydrating cleansing wipes during the evening to remove my makeup and cleanoses the skin i found the wipes very soft and easy to use the wipes are nothe too wet or rough with just enough product on them to remove stubborn make up and feel gentle at the same time ideal for when you need tone take off makeup in a hurry and handy for traveling i would recommend for anyone that has sensitive or dry skin this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple refreshing shower gel 250ml
review_text: as a regular user of a number of simple products i was very impressed with there refreshing shower gel i suffer with quite dry skin during the winter and when using other brands of shower gel they can sometimes act harshly and leave my skin quite dry and flaky especially on my face however with this simple shower gel this is not the case it does not irritate my skin in face it leaves my complexion looking clearer and my skin feeling soft the size of the bottle is adequate for everyday use and regular use and although the packaging is quite mild it does the job i would definitely choose this shower gel out of the choice a little bit goes a long way and the product has a pleasent scent this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple refreshing shower gel 250ml
review_title: a gel that will refresh you
review_text: i love having a shower in the morning and moreover using a really fresh shower gel this is the first thing i need to have a great day with the simple refreshing shower gel this is exactly what i was looking for something simple and nonodorous the refreshing shower gel is the perfect blend of ingredients to clean and energise your skin perfect for even the most sensitive skin this review was collected as part of a promotion

review_text: so i have a oily combination skin type and i am forever getting spots and blackheads in my tzone because of this especially over my nose being fed up with it all i started to cleanse tone and moisturise this toner is by far the best one i have ever used it smells amazing it doesn2019t irritate my skin like some other brands i2019ve tried do despite not having sensitive skin and my blackheads and spots are clearing up my oily tzone isn2019t so much of a problem anymore definitely getting this from now on and recommending to anyone that has similar issues to me this review was collected as part of a promotion

product_description: simple kind to skin refreshing facial gel wash 150ml

product_description: persil powercaps non bio washing capsules 38 wash 1026g
review_title: extremely good value persil washing capsules
review_text: some things in life are enjoyable to buy and some things plainly are not no matter how pretty the product and how bright and bold the actual washing detergent is it will always be a grudge purchase no one likes to have dirty smelly clothes and wash powder tablets capsules are a necessity that makes a hole in everyones weekly grocery budget that could be better spent on something interesting such as cakes or exotic vegetables that you have to look up how to cook along with ariel fairy and bold persil is one of the big brands that dominant the market for detergents it is owned by global consumer products giant unilever who are experts at branding and marketing it is refreshing to see these capsules at such reasonable value they work out 15p each which is an absolute bargain even the dodgy imitation ones you find in sub prime supermarkets are more than these and the great thing about persil is that you can guarantee that the product is going to be high quality these capsules come in a rubbery gossamer coated casing containing a different brightly coloured gel like liquids in each of the four compartments and very funky they look too with purple green white and grey swirls of gu these things wash your clothes nicely too and have a pleasant smell without being too overbearing i have no idea what happens to the plasticated casing on the outside of the capsule after you put in in the washing machine maybe it biodegrades maybe it disappears by magic this is one of lives great mysteries like the great sphinx at giza the bermuda triangle or the meaning of the voynich manuscript

product_description: persil powercaps non bio washing capsules 38 wash 1026g
review_text: please wash really well and there is no residue left in the drum washing comes out clean and smelling fresh

review_title: clothes are clean and smell nice
review_text: happy with purchasing this product in bulk cheaper than picking it up from the supermarket did not find any residue after the wash

product_description: simple regeneration age resisting eye cream 15ml
review_text: time after time i return to this product while it is designed probably for younger skin i am in my 50s with menopausal skin which is sometimes irritated and find that this cream helps to calm down excema redness etc on its own it does not reduce the wrinkles and crepey skin that come with aging but when layered and used in conjunction with hyaluronic based creams that are water based it makes a wonderful companion and does a good job of making my eyes look reasonable and ironing out some of the wrinkles and loss of firmness it is easily absorbed doesnt leave greasy skin so is great under make up can be used with day or night eye creams best of all its a good price

product_description: simple kind to hair gentle care shampoo 200ml
review_text: helped my scalp so much but the price is ridiculous when you consider the amount you have to use per wash and that you must buy the conditioner too any other non gentle brand would last me 4 times longer than this it feels like people with illness are being rinsed no pun intended its a no go for really long hair i will be looking into other cheaper alternatives but the product is great its helped with my husbands dermatitis and with my sore scalp at first my hair went dry and was like hay then it was switching back and forth from dry to greasy but after a few weeks its looking healthier than ever im wondering if it just takes time for your hair to get used to less stuff on it and to get back to more of its natural form if you know what i meanmy main advice would be to try it for 6 weeks minimum before you write it off as rubbishmy only other annoyance aside from the price is that its very thin and runny its hard to stop it running down my hair then off down my back so 20 of the bottle just goes down the plug hole without ever washing my hair first

product_description: persil powercaps non bio washing capsules 38 wash 1026g
review_text: i used to only every purchase fairy non bio liquid as my husband suffers with eczema and is extremely sensitive i would have never purchased anything else but my brother said try persil non bio its great for my nephews sensitive skin he gave me some of his and i randomly washed clothes and bedding in persil as i didnt want my husband to say he had a flare down to the change he didnt result for me because i love the fresh smell i have also noticed and difference in the brightness of my whites and clothes are so soft i live in a hard water area and the results are great the capsules are so convenient and perform great with only one because i am very heavy handed and fill the washing balls up so i am also saving money with these i am now a subscriber so dont have to worry about running out i do wish they wasnt so attractive on the eye because they do look edible please keep out of reach of children because the packaging isnt child proof

review_text: im nearly 26 so i said a year a go i must start using a night cream i have dry and sensitive skin i used the simple purifying cleansing lotion and soothing toner and light moisturiser there all amazing but the night is fantastic its moisturising and when i have spots it clears them up and makes my face look plump and takes my dryness away it doesnt sting my eyes but the day cream does i think its because of the spf anyways really love this cream

review_text: oddly enough this shampoo now performs much better than it did at the start not the most moisturising shampoo out there my hair at first felt a little dry and stripped however not wanting to throw it out before id given it a good go i persevered for a few more washes and now im glad i did it leaves my hair soft and shiny smooth and manageable and my scalp comfortable it lathers and cleans well enough for my greasy roots without stripping the drier ends gives light moisture to hair without building up its grown on me and i now use it everyday

product_description: persil powercaps bio washing capsules 38 wash 1026g
review_text: i tried these as im fed up of powder and conditioner leaving a mess in the washing machine drawer and also taking up loads of space in the cupboards wed tried another brand however they werent perfumed and the other half likes his laundry to have a fragrance to it personal preference so i shopped around to find a cheap but known brand and found these in subscribe and save were using them every few days and can say we are quite happy with them they smell nice but not over powering leave no residue in the drum or on clothes come in refill packs so i can top up my container and then the bin isnt full of powder boxes and they are easy to use as theres no question over how much to use also as a plus they dont seem to bleach clothing as i found happened occasionally when using powder that got stuck in clothing and not rinsed out properly if these stay at a good price then i will continue to buy as im very happy with them

product_description: simple kind to skin soothing facial toner 200ml
review_text: about two weeks after using this my bad cystic acne started to fade by the time i finished the bottle all my acne was gonei thought i was just missing toner in my skin care so i started using a garnier one i had from a set one week later my acne comes back so im back to using simple and my acne is fading againi will never stop using this

product_description: simple kind to skin soothing facial toner 200ml
review_text: i bought this a couple of months ago along with the cleanser and moisturiser as i have spot prone oily skin and occasional issues with dermatitis around my eyes this was the worst mistake ever i thought i was crazy as simple is supposed to be gentle on the skin but after using this toner it has dried my skin out and bought the dermatitis back around my eyes so they are very red the skin flaky and sore in places at first i didnt think it was the toner but after two months of elimination it is definitely the toner drying out my skin i would not recommend this product at all

product_description: persil comfort new baby essential laundry kit3 items
review_text: my wife has extremely sensitive skin which i never believed until i inadvertently washed some of her clothing in a different detergent on that basis she has used either persil or fairy products for our joint laundry for many years combine that with the fact that we cannot use biological products as we have a septic tank this product is ideal the detergent is dispensed into a capsule which is inserted into the main body of the product and then placed on top of the laundry there is sufficient detergent for 48 washes from the two bottles the detergent is complimented by a fabric conditioner which is measured out into the fabric compartment softener on the washing machine there is sufficient to condition 24 washes both products have a pleasant clean fragrance and leave clothing smelling fresh and soft after drying a really good product for those with sensitive skin and competitively priced against normal supermarket prices

product_description: persil comfort new baby essential laundry kit3 items
review_text: in this kit for sensitive skin you get x2 persil nonbiological washing detergent potentially 48 washes and x1 ultraconcentrate comfort pure potentially 38 washes i say potentially because if you are doing larger loads youll need to increase the amount you use we tend to alternate between fairy and persil nonbio not only because we have young children but also because some family members have sensitive skin weve never had an issue with someone having a reaction due to persil its probably our preferred brand we dont use comfort pure all the time because some members of the family dont like how it leaves their clothes feeling too soft but we do use it on the childrens clothes because it leaves them nice and soft both products in this kit are endorsed by the british skin foundation price for the kit at the time of writing the review is 11 this is slightly more than you would currently get the individual products in some supermarkets 3 for each product but you are getting them delivered too if you wanted to give a practical baby shower gift this would be ideal slightly different to a nappy pyramid would also make a practical housewarming present overall good products that work slightly on the expensive side

review_text: do not buy this or any other simple products as they have changed the preservatives in them i have come out in a bad sore rash my eyes are burning and my top lip tingled i had to wash it all off i phoned simple and she told me they have had a product change in all their stuff changing the preservatives when i asked why she just said i dont know it just changed i want to know why theres no good reason except maybe for them to save money using cheaper ingredients ive used simple products for nearly 20 years since nivea did the same and sold their company to a german company who changed all their products im really angry about this what am i supposed to use now i have very sensitive skin and simple was ok but now its rubbish im skin is sore burnt and simple just dont care please be careful as i usually stock up when my products are on offer but fully asda gave me a refund onto a gift card as i didnt have the receipt for the 6 bottles i had or id have been well out if pocket

product_description: dove nourishing medium to dark visible glow 400ml
review_text: after being caught out by the sudden nice weather and me still being as pale as an uncooked chip i bought a bottle of this to try the very first time i used it i did have a couple of streaks on my legs then i read the instructions and realised it says you must apply it in circles so the next day i used a liberal amount and made sure to use a circular motion all over and i was delighted that on only the second day i had enough colour to go barelegged it had also covered up the streaks tooi have now applied this for 4 days running and look like i have been away for a week in the sun it is a really natural even colour there is a bit of a whiff of fake tan when you first apply it but it wears off after a few hours my skins feels so smooth and moisturised too which is an added bonus

product_description: dove nourishing medium to dark visible glow 400ml
review_title: if youre not a fan of tan youll be converted
review_text: ive always longed for more of a healthy colour to my skin as i am extremely pale but have been put off each time i have used a tanning product because well its been disastrous however this is the first and only successful product that i have used which creates a beautifully even healthy and natural tan within a few daysi could not rate this enough i also have sensitive spotprone skin on my face but i have been able to use this on my face successfully as well longlasting deeply moisturising and super natural 1010 my favourite

product_description: dove nourishing medium to dark visible glow 400ml
review_text: ive been using this product for 3 days now i have a natural tan from this easy to apply and i like this better than the bondi sands gradual tan it does have a slight fake tan smell at first but this wears away very pleased

review_text: having quite fair skin its hard to find a product that does not make you go streaky and look like you have been sprayed in orange juice well i have been applying this for a week now and my skin looks and feels amazing i have had so many comments on what a nice colour my skin is so i went back and bought 3 more bottles today only reason i didnt give 5 stars is because as its developing the smell is a bit strong smells like your cooking haha but to get such an amazing result im happy with that highly recommend

review_text: i bought this because i am very fair and hide from sunshine however this product felt good as a moisturizer however felt clingy and greazy after a few minutes after 2 hours of waiting the cream remains sticky also no change in my skin colour i am really disappointed i advise not to buy this product

product_description: dove dermaspa fair to medium summer revived 200ml
review_text: purchased because it was on offer and my blindingly white legs needed a bit of help i only wanted a gradual tanner because there is less chance of obvious streaks it smelt nice on application a light floral scent however within a few hours it smelt stronger than actual full on fake tan very unpleasant i could also feel the cream sitting on my skin not fully absorbed or dry the actual tanning result was barely noticeable i wont be buying again

product_description: dove dermaspa fair to medium summer revived 200ml
review_title: love it natural looking bronzed glow
review_text: love this i am fair haired blue eyed lily white skin older lady who burns to a crisp in the sun when i uncover having just returned from holiday i wanted to at least look like i had a tan but it was very cold there i bought this on offer and went for fair med the first time i put it on my arms all over sparingly i didnt really notice that much although there was definately something today i thought let me add a bit more after a my usual morning shower i applied a bit more liberally over arms legs and face i have had comments today on what a lovely glow i have it has developed nicely today i have a sassy looking healthy bod and i feel good bought another tube and just ordered a few more whilst on offer i hate sitting in the sun and burning unless i am covered in p20 lotion and this is a very safe way to get the bronze look no streaks easy to apply doesnt stain hands slight tan smell but not too much i am hooked

product_description: dove dermaspa fair to medium summer revived 200ml
review_text: really like the light colour this product gives meeasy to use streak free however reading a lot of reviews many claim the lotion dries quickly however this is not my experience i spend about an hour drying off and am sticky most of the day

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: follow the pouring instructions and you are on a winner
review_text: great fragrance that strikes just the right balance although the wife complains that the small bottles are very difficult to pour accurately from they probably are if you slurp in what you reckon is a full measure and in fact it is nearer two full measures this is a really quick way to use up a small 540 ml bottlebutif you use the cap as a measure as it is supposed to bethen you will find it is a very economical way to use the conditioner very cool fragrance which actually carries through to your clothes making you smell like a fresh sky if you know what such a thing smells like something else i really like about this conditioner is that the bottles are all made from recyclable plastic and the manufacturer is asking for customers to recycle the new bottles so they can go the same path third time around three stars for the product and another one for being good and green

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: economical softens clothes not as good as dedicated fragrancers if you want a lasting scent
review_text: great price for these bottles and you only need a small amount half a cap in the wash to soften clothes the smell is nice but doesnt last if you want something that lingers try lenor unstoppables but that wont soften clothes that said the softening effect is noticeable even when handwashing delicate underwear i like the ultra concentration which reduces the size of the bottles for storage

product_description: comfort intense fuchsia passion fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: this is an ultra concentrated fabric conditioner i was initially surprised at how small the bottles were but then i read on the side that you only need half a cap of the product so each bottle will last you a while it is nice to be able to fit the bottles in my kitchen cupboard i did find that half a cap was enough i live in an area with very hard water and my clothes came out of the wash feeling soft and smelling lovely i did really like the scent although it is nothing special it just had that generic floral fabric conditioner scent that they all have

product_description: comfort pure fabric conditioner 166 wash 5l
review_text: bought one of the smaller sized bottles of the same softener to compare quality and was disappointed to find this was much thinner than the kind you find in the shop has been heavily diluted so no real saving will be going back to getting it in the shop and cancelling my subscription

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: comfort intense laundry conditioner liquid fresh sky
review_text: our household normally use comfort however i hadnt used the fresh sky scent before which i must say is really nice just dont go sniffing directly from the bottle as its concentrated the scent is much more intense that it really is the ultra concentrated allows for a much smaller bottle and you dont need to use as much in the washing machine either just half a lid worth the smaller bottle of course makes the carbon footprint smaller in addition the bottle is made from 100 recycled plastic which is a bonus and both the bottle and lid can be recycled back only downside is the sleeve isnt so do make sure you remove this before throwing the bottle in the recycling hopefully they will work on making the whole thing recyclable in the future all in all good value for money and great scent though the latter is subjective

product_description: pot noodle chicken mushroom king pot 114g
review_text: lovely

product_description: comfort intense fuchsia passion fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: this listing is for a pack of 8 concentrated fabric softeners although i received a sample for review purposes note that the container is made from 100 recycled plastic and is suitable for further recycling but you do need to remove the plastic wrap that holds the product information once the bottle is used up as you need it beforehand for dosing information i found i needed to use a jar opener to remove the lid for the first time i guess that is good when you are receiving this via the post as it means there is less chance of the lid coming loose and spilling contents into the parcel rather than onto your clothes i like the scent which transfers well to laundry and leaves it smelling floral without being overly sweet it would be worth sniffing in a shop before committing to a large pack however as not all laundry scents are to everyones taste the softness is fantastic particularly noticeable after laundry has been dried outside which normally makes it feel stiff a bottle will cover up to 36 loads 45 kg you will only manage 16 larger 67 kg loads the bottle looks small but the liquid is very concentrated so do use the dosing cap rather than just pour into the machine as you will otherwise use too much probably

product_description: pot noodle chicken mushroom king pot 114g

review_text: if i was a wildeyed enthusiast and was asked to rate free magnums as part of a promotion id perhaps err on the generous side as a paying customer however these are nothing to write home about theres an uncomfortable flavour clash between the dark chocolate coating and the sickly sweet raspberry sauce which covers the core thats difficult to describe the core itself reminded me of the cheapest imaginable insipid own brand raspberry icecream with little of the smooth creaminess you find in other magnums its almost as if they rushed the product development process and ended up with bitter raspberry ripple on a stick so so disappointing when you consider what these could have been

product_description: comfort intense fuchsia passion fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: these are 540ml bottles giving 36 wash loads of fuchsia passion fabric conditioner by comfort the bottles are entirely plastic made from 100 recycled plastic and are 100 recyclable the bottles have a narrow screw top which is used as the measure and the bottle has an accurate slim pourer no dribbles this one is concentrated and needs only a capful for each washload ive used comfort on and off for many years and this fuchsia passion fragrance is a very nice light floral fragrance my towels and clothing all felt nice and soft after being washed and dried and had a lovely smell of flowers with a hint of fruit mango and freshly laundered clothing its not too strong or overpowering at all just a nice smell of just washed clothes

product_description: comfort ultra concentrated pure fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: clearly this latest product variation from comfort is to address some environmental concerns and plastics waste the product is highly concentrated so comes in a smaller bottle that is itself recycled reduced packaging and transport costs all very commendable just how concentrated the product is can be sensed from the fact that you can detect the scent before you even open the bottle when you do dont breath deeply as i did its overpowering however in its more dilute form just half a cap per load it does add a pleasant slightly zesty aroma to your clothes the scent will be a matter of taste but we like it and our washing feels soft and pleasant though we were already regular comfort users in this form the product represents good value for a quality product and for those who want to lessen their impact on the environment albeit in the smallest of ways theres something for you here too

product_description: sure maximum protection clean scent cream stick antiperspirant 45ml
review_text: i usually use secret which is the best by a country mile out of many many anti perspirants ive tried over many years added this to my pantry order just to get free delivery but wow its rubbish 8hrs after using and i start feeling wet and sticky under the arms and thats after a fairly sedentary day cant recommend at all one of the worst ive tried one star for the lovely smell though even if its a little strong for me back to secret for me

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: its a fabric conditioner not a game changer
review_text: the hype attached to the scent of fabric conditioner is something as a family we ignore all we want is for the clothes to smell fresh and pleasant after a wash to be soft and comfortable to wear and for the product to be economical fortunately this one fulfills all the criteria when i say to smell fresh and pleasant i dont mean stink the place out with the scent and overpower and wilt everything in a 100 yard radius again fortunately this doesnt do so and so gets a general thumbs up but i could have done without the wording bigging up the wonderfulness of the smells to me thats an alarm call not to purchase ill whisk myself away with my own favourite perfumes i dont want my clothes having a bigsmell life of their own

product_description: persil comfort new baby essential laundry kit3 items
review_title: nice gentle products that dont upset my familys eczemaprone skin
review_text: these are gentle skinkind versions within the persil and comfort ranges the bundled pack is a practical suggestion that offers good value compared to the individual retail prices of 2x25 wash persil and 1x38 wash comfort making the fabric softener effectively free i cant remember not using persil nonbiological as my laundry detergent of choice its the brand i grew up with one that doesnt irritate the eczema and allergy prone skin of several members of my family it has a pleasant but not overly dominant scent and the fluid formulation means this can be used even on cold washes the comfort is a highly concentrated version in quite a small bottle in real life the bottle is rather smaller than the product photo makes it appear in relation to the persil but this doesnt represent poor value 38 washes worth is 38 washes worth regardless of the size container in which it comes and the small size does a good job of keeping the use of packaging materials down

product_description: persil comfort new baby essential laundry kit3 items
review_title: im returning to the persil nonbio fold
review_text: i used persil nonbio for many years but changed to a brand specifically for babies about eight years ago so it was a bit of a homecoming using it again i really like the fliptop opening and how smoothly the product pours into the dispenser ball which is much easier than the crosscut design on my usual brand that requires a fair amount of pressure i never had a problem with how well persil cleans and this hasnt changed a machine load of baby clothes together with stains muslins and bedding came out spotless with the addition of the comfort pure conditioner the laundry was very soft and smelled lovely it also performs well on general washing i have decided to go back to using persil nonbio not just for the frustrationfree dispenser but it performs so well and is kind to skin using it again has made me wonder why i ever left the brand in the first place

review_text: i regularly use comfort intense conditioner the fuscia scented one is my favourite ive tried the fresh sky one too which is nice but the fuscia one is beautiful and the scent lasts a long time i use this along with the matching scent pearls use half a capful of this along with your normal detergent then once dried you have this incredible dreamy scent that really lasts you can smell it subtly when you open your wardrobe its lovely this bumper box is a good way to buy in bulk or go to your supermaket and look out for special offers highly recommended this is the best conditioner weve tried

product_description: persil comfort new baby essential laundry kit3 items
review_title: a goodvalue bundle for sensitive skin featuring two bottles of persil and one of comfort
review_text: although biological detergents are generally more effective than nonbio versions this version of persil works well enough on babies wear and on normal soiling of the clothes of older people with sensitive skin this handy pack includes two bottles of persil nonbio liquid detergent 24 wash size and one of comfort pure fabric conditioner 36 wash size and is decent value at eleven pounds currently from amazon these two nonbiological products are dermatologically tested and endorsed by the british skin foundation they have been developed especially to be kind to sensitive baby skin good cleaning power for a nonbiological washing detergent with soft and safe conditioning well worth trying on your little ones clothes or on your own if you have sensitive skin

review_text: at the current price this works out at about 75p per wash which considering the price of own label fabric conditioner is good value okay you have to buy a box of it but if you have enough storage space its the way to go it has a pleasant scent and its a good size though in this house weve been used to bigger bottles the claim is it has 36 washes per bottle but thats using the recommended 12 cap but i have to admit weve been using slightly more than that okay that own label stuff will be cheaper and does come in a larger size but you do tend to have to use a bit more each wash

product_description: comfort intense fuchsia passion fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: i was a bit worried that a product called intense might leave an overpowering scent on your laundry who wants to walk around smelling of fabric conditioner thankfully its not like that at all and the scent it leaves is fresh and quite subtle once dry and lingers around without being too pervasive the fresh sky fragrance is appealing and not too chemicallike with a fruityfloral mix for me it suits household items more than clothes things like towels and bed linen are left softened and freshsmelling i appreciate the small bottle size and concentrated liquid and that it has less environmental impact but i do think that the concentrated liquids are less effective at softening than the more dilute liquids are if youre looking for the best softening then consider a fullsized bottle but if you prefer a more subtle softening effect but the same fresh fragrance then this concentrated version is a great buy

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: doesnt just soften and scent the wash but the whole house smells fresh and clean
review_text: ive not used a separate conditioner in years because most washing products these days seem to do it all i hadnt realised how much of a scent boost a separate fabric conditioner delivers and how much it actually does soften the wash the bottles 6 of them and not 8 as the ad states come in a compact box and tbh that itself could be used to deliver the products in rather than having that placed in an amazon box with more paper wrapping all of the packaging including the empty bottles can be recycled you dont waste any of the liquid as the top of the bottle is well designed to minimise spillage and so that you can pour just what you need half a capful is recommended but i went with a little more and not a gush of liquid from a large spout ive had to dry indoors today due to the weather and my whole house smells of this im really impressed with this and even for 6 bottles rather than the stated 8 this is good value for money i also like that the small bottles mean that i can store them on a lower shelf for heavier items rather than risking my undersink shelving collapsing yes its happened more than once just dont squeeze the bottles hard as theyre made from recycled plastic and are a little flimsyfeeling

review_text: this is a more traditional scent from fabric conditioning experts comfort this 8 pack is highly concentrated so you dont need to place much in the conditioner tray for it to be effective the bottle is made from recycled plastic and itself can be recycled a nice set of 8 bottles

product_description: comfort intense fresh sky fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_text: comfort intense has a nice fresh fragrance although dont use more than recommended as it can be quite strong the bottle is a nice size easy for storing in a cupboard and although it looks small you get a lot of washes out of the bottle it does leave fabrics softer and is good for using with stuff you wash regularly like towels highly recommended

product_description: comfort intense fuchsia passion fabric conditioner 38 wash 570ml
review_title: brings comfort to your clothes and your soul
review_text: i love this product it retains the quality one expects from the well known makers and leaves clothes feeling soft and smelling fresh the concept of ultra concentrate isnt new as i recall they did one years ago in a tetra type pack but now maybe public are ready for this innovation the container is made from recycled plastic which is fantastic and refillable it is also recyclable but the sleeve isnt which is a disappointment im hoping the refill packs are from a more cardboard style pack though and fully recyclable im glad it has a dose counter as it seems so much less to use it would be easy to put in too much if it wasnt there my other half and i have sensitive skin and this was fine for us to use i found it hard to read the small print on the wrapper even with magnification glass but i couldnt see anything to say if it was tested on animals or if any animal products used in the making although this is not a food product these are issues that are important for many whilst it provides details of the headquarter offices it doesnt actually say where its produced i think this would be helpful to know as for many people myself included would prefer to buy products made in country of sale to reduce carbon footprint i am a little torn about this product as if it was a washing powder or liquid and comfort softener combination i cant help thinking that cuts down packaging and carbon footprint further and can be better value however separate comfort softener such as this does make clothes smell lovely

product_description: cornetto made with soy and gluten free ice cream cones 4 x 90ml
review_text: im a coeliac and intolerant to cows milk and have a huge sweet tooth ive found some amazing vegan ice cream alternatives ocado sell a number of delicious ones i also love tescos gluten and dairy free cornettos however was super excited to try these especially after all the amazing reviews the tops are covered in nuts and chocolate and the cone is thick and crispy however none of these bits are quite enough to hide the awful taste of the ice cream i cant even describe it as bland as it had a flavour just an awful one it was not creamy and ice cream like it was like frozen whipped up soya milk that they removed the flavour from i enjoyed eating the chocolate and nut part and the cone and just cringed my way through the ice cream part cant understand all the rave reviews the vegan magnums however are spot on and delicious
